args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- We state the classical Galois-theoretic characterization of solvability by radicals.
    Let p(x) be an irreducible polynomial over ℚ and G = GaloisGroup p its Galois group.
    Then the (complex) roots of p are expressible in terms of radicals iff G is solvable.

    This file contains only the formal statement (no proof). -/

universe u

constant GaloisGroup : Polynomial ℚ → Type u
axiom GaloisGroup_group (p : Polynomial ℚ) : Group (GaloisGroup p)

/-- Predicate: the polynomial p is irreducible. -/
constant IsIrreducible : Polynomial ℚ → Prop

/-- Predicate: the polynomial p is solvable by radicals (its complex roots are expressible
    in terms of a finite combination of field operations and taking nth roots). -/
constant IsSolvableByRadicals : Polynomial ℚ → Prop

/-- Predicate: a group is solvable. -/
constant IsSolvableGroup : Π (G : Type u) [Group G], Prop

/-- Main statement: an irreducible polynomial over ℚ is solvable by radicals iff its
    Galois group is a solvable group. -/
theorem polynomial_solvable_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable
  (p : Polynomial ℚ) (hp : IsIrreducible p) :
  IsSolvableByRadicals p ↔ IsSolvableGroup (GaloisGroup p) := by
  sorry

/-- Classical Galois-theoretic statement: for an irreducible polynomial p over ℚ, the
    complex roots of p are expressible in terms of radicals iff its Galois group is solvable.

    Only the formal statement is given here (no proof). -/

constant GaloisGroup (p : Polynomial ℚ) : Type
constant GaloisGroup_group {p : Polynomial ℚ} : Group (GaloisGroup p)

constant IsIrreducible (p : Polynomial ℚ) : Prop
constant IsSolvableByRadicals (p : Polynomial ℚ) : Prop
constant IsSolvableGroup (G : Type) [Group G] : Prop

theorem polynomial_solvable_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable
  (p : Polynomial ℚ) (hp : IsIrreducible p) :
  IsSolvableByRadicals p ↔ IsSolvableGroup (GaloisGroup p) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Classical Galois-theoretic statement: for an irreducible polynomial p over Rat, the
    complex roots of p are expressible in terms of radicals iff its Galois group is solvable.

    Only the formal statement is given here (no proof). -/

constant GaloisGroup (p : Polynomial Rat) : Type
constant GaloisGroup_inst_group (p : Polynomial Rat) : Group (GaloisGroup p)

constant IsIrreducible (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant IsSolvableByRadicals (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant IsSolvableGroup (G : Type) [Group G] : Prop

theorem polynomial_solvable_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable
  (p : Polynomial Rat) (hp : IsIrreducible p) :
  IsSolvableByRadicals p ↔ IsSolvableGroup (GaloisGroup p) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Classical Galois-theoretic statement: for an irreducible polynomial p over Rat, the
    complex roots of p are expressible in terms of radicals iff its Galois group is solvable.

    Only the formal statement is given here (no proof). -/

constant GaloisGroup_of_poly (p : Polynomial Rat) : Type
constant GaloisGroup_of_poly_group (p : Polynomial Rat) : Group (GaloisGroup_of_poly p)

constant IsIrreduciblePoly (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant SolvableByRadicalsPoly (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant IsSolvableGroupType (G : Type) [Group G] : Prop

theorem polynomial_solvable_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable
  (p : Polynomial Rat) (hp : IsIrreduciblePoly p) :
  SolvableByRadicalsPoly p ↔ IsSolvableGroupType (GaloisGroup_of_poly p) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

constant GaloisGroup_of_poly (p : Polynomial Rat) : Type
constant GaloisGroup_of_poly_group {p : Polynomial Rat} : Group (GaloisGroup_of_poly p)

constant IsIrreduciblePoly (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant SolvableByRadicalsPoly (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant IsSolvableGroupType (G : Type) [Group G] : Prop

theorem polynomial_solvable_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable
  (p : Polynomial Rat) (hp : IsIrreduciblePoly p) :
  SolvableByRadicalsPoly p ↔ IsSolvableGroupType (GaloisGroup_of_poly p) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Classical Galois-theoretic statement: for an irreducible polynomial p with rational
    coefficients, the complex roots of p are expressible in terms of radicals iff its
    Galois group is solvable.

    Only the formal statement is given here (no proof). -/

constant PolynomialQ : Type

constant GaloisGroup (p : PolynomialQ) : Type
constant GaloisGroup_group {p : PolynomialQ} : Group (GaloisGroup p)

constant IsIrreducible (p : PolynomialQ) : Prop
constant SolvableByRadicals (p : PolynomialQ) : Prop
constant IsSolvableGroup (G : Type) [Group G] : Prop

theorem polynomial_solvable_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable
  (p : PolynomialQ) (hp : IsIrreducible p) :
  SolvableByRadicals p ↔ IsSolvableGroup (GaloisGroup p) := by
  sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Statement: Let p(x) be an irreducible polynomial with rational coefficients and
    let G be its Galois group. Then the complex roots of p are expressible in
    terms of radicals iff G is a solvable group.

    Only the formal (unproven) statement is given here. -/

constant Galois_group_of_poly_rat (p : Polynomial Rat) : Type
constant Galois_group_of_poly_rat_group (p : Polynomial Rat) : Group (Galois_group_of_poly_rat p)

constant irreducible_poly_rat (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant solvable_by_radicals_poly_rat (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant is_solvable_group_type (G : Type) [Group G] : Prop

theorem poly_irreducible_solvable_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable
  (p : Polynomial Rat) (hp : irreducible_poly_rat p) :
  solvable_by_radicals_poly_rat p ↔ is_solvable_group_type (Galois_group_of_poly_rat p) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let p(x) be an irreducible polynomial with rational coefficients, and let
    G = Gal(p) be its Galois group. Then the complex roots of p(x) are
    expressible in terms of radicals iff G is a solvable group.

    This file contains only the formal statement (no proof). -/

constant PolynomialQ : Type

constant GaloisGroup (p : PolynomialQ) : Type
constant GaloisGroup_group {p : PolynomialQ} : Group (GaloisGroup p)

constant IsIrreducible (p : PolynomialQ) : Prop
constant RootsSolvableByRadicals (p : PolynomialQ) : Prop
constant IsSolvableGroup (G : Type) [Group G] : Prop

theorem solvable_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable
  (p : PolynomialQ) (hp : IsIrreducible p) :
  RootsSolvableByRadicals p ↔ IsSolvableGroup (GaloisGroup p) := by
  sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let p(x) be an irreducible polynomial with rational coefficients, and let
    G = Gal(p) be its Galois group. Then the complex roots of p(x) are
    expressible in terms of radicals iff G is a solvable group.

    Only the formal (unproven) statement is given here. -/

constant PolyQ : Type

constant GaloisGroup : PolyQ → Type
constant GaloisGroup_group {p : PolyQ} : Group (GaloisGroup p)

constant Irreducible (p : PolyQ) : Prop
constant Roots_expressible_by_radicals (p : PolyQ) : Prop
constant IsSolvableGroup (G : Type) [Group G] : Prop

theorem roots_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable (p : PolyQ) (hp : Irreducible p) :
  Roots_expressible_by_radicals p ↔ IsSolvableGroup (GaloisGroup p) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

constant gal (p : Polynomial Rat) : Type
constant gal_group {p : Polynomial Rat} : Group (gal p)

constant irreducible_poly (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant expressible_by_radicals (p : Polynomial Rat) : Prop
constant group_solvable (G : Type) [Group G] : Prop

theorem expressible_by_radicals_iff_galois_group_solvable
  (p : Polynomial Rat) (hp : irreducible_poly p) :
  expressible_by_radicals p ↔ group_solvable (gal p) := by
  sorry
